title: Datazoom Overview
description:
These  widgets are examples that allow you to gain insights about your viewer's video experience. Easily send data from your video player to Datadog and start to get a better idea of your viewer's streaming experience.

**Configure your Datadog Collector here** — [Collector setup](https://help.datazoom.io/hc/en-us/articles/360042494512-Datadog)

**Learn more about metrics here** — [Metrics Encyclopedia](https://help.datazoom.io/hc/en-us/sections/360010671291-Metrics-Encyclopedia)

**Learn more about Datazoom here** — [datazoom.io](https://www.datazoom.io/)

definition.content:
![alt text](https://app.datazoom.io/images/datazoom-logo-med-new.svg)

These  widgets are examples that allow you to gain insights about your viewer's video experience. Easily send data from your video player to Datadog and start to get a better idea of your viewer's streaming experience.

**Configure your Datadog Collector here** — [Collector setup](https://help.datazoom.io/hc/en-us/articles/360042494512-Datadog)

**Learn more about metrics here** — [Metrics Encyclopedia](https://help.datazoom.io/hc/en-us/sections/360010671291-Metrics-Encyclopedia)

**Learn more about Datazoom here** — [datazoom.io](https://www.datazoom.io/)
